creator: romal@vistaportal.com
poi-support@buni.org
text:
retargeting for version 1.5 -- this must be fixed before we release.  I'll
investigate this soon if no one else does.  (first I have to rebuild my server)
-- Libin, can you see if maybe you can supply a patch to fix this as well?  I'd
like to make sure 1.5 (which will be out in a matter of days most likely) does
not contain this bug.

creator: glens@apache.org
text: Fixed.  Will be committing to BRANCH soon.

creator: glens@apache.org
text:
That will be done when I do a merge.  Do you need it straight away?  What do 
you think a good policy would be: merge after every change or merge on an adhoc 
basis?

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
bug fixes should be applied in both places simultaneously...  this prevents the
branches from getting toooooo far appart.

creator: glens@apache.org
text:
No no no... much easier to simply make the change in one place then use CVS 
merge the changes back to the trunk.

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
its your world man...I'm just living in it. . Do as  you see fit.  I trust your
judgment.  I wouldn't let you pick my production operating system..but other
htan that ;-)
Don't mess with the branch manager man...
creator: glens@apache.org
